description: Rdocumentation-Browser is the package to browse the web, preview files, auto-reload, and search Rdocumentation.org within Atom
name: rdocumentation-browser
readme: Atom-Browser is the package to browse the web, preview files, auto-reload, and search Rdocumentation.org within Atom

viewShowBackground.title: White Background
